column4: i currently have ubuntu 7.10 server installed.. how can i update it to the new version? and if i do , will it keep all my settings and installed programs unchanged ?
baaad idea. Servers are supposed to be STABLE. upgrading to a distro the day it was released is begging for instability
so are you saying i shouldn't update ?
well, you can try, but if your server is a live system (actively serving a purpose) then you should wait, and perhaps install HH server on a test system
